Text:
WUT-UP HELLBOY

Listen, I downloaded ur torrent & all went well with that. Itz the install notez Im having a prob with. Im new 2 the bittorrent world & still in da learning phase yamean, so if u could break-down da install instruction 4 me & anyone else who is stuck where I am that would b very much appriciated fam. Also wut do u need 2 open the the "DRIVER DB DAT FILE"? Will wait 2 hear from u peace.


                    BLACKPHOENIXRIZIN

BLACKPHOENIXRIZIN:

First of all you need to copy/paste the DriverDB.dat file to 'C:\Program Files\Driver Magician'
Refer this tutorial : http://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=51299
After that enter the serial I've provided and now the program should be registered

Sorry, but the serial is not working. So. Working if I wrote the serial, but after first driver update (the program update the DriverDB.dat) the software sign as unregistered. But the program database update is a standard feature
This program will not remain registered.  As soon as the pc restarts, it drops the registration.  Nice program, but won't continue working.  Damnit.
same shite as the supposed pre cracked one both are worthless try one that works
